ygData.subject: Re: chain/fear
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Exploiter Explorers?  I could handle that.  I like to exploit things, of course in the sense of the word as defined above. I honestly havent heard anything
ygData.messageBody:
>Why not just call bards exploiters? One dictionary
>definition of "exploit" is: To utilize; to make available;
>to get the value or usefulness out of;

Exploiter Explorers? I could handle that. I like to exploit
things, of course in the sense of the word as defined above.

I honestly havent heard anything about kiting since that one
big patch. No complaints either way. Complete silence. I
don't think it's that big of an issue as you play it to be.
It was before, but like I said, no one has said a peep on the
game server, the lists, the web, or by other means.

It's like the kiting that you refer to just went underground
and vanished from plain sight. I consistantly fear/chain in
outdoor battle with my groups; it reduces dmg taken. I've
never solo'd with those tactics since high 20s, and even then
I did it to see if I could.

Harmonic Distortion, 38th unchained melody.
League of Antonican Bards, The Wind Spirit's Song
< Keepers of Norrath > Innoruuk
